response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this item at an exceptional price tailored to your financial capacity. Considering its unique features and the significant benefits it can bring to you, I propose a price of $1,200,000. This offer not only reflects the product's true worth but also provides you with a substantial saving. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute positively to your endeavors.", "product_price": 1200000}
